summary: Two great stories on forgiveness! "The Grapes of Wrath" features Junior Asparagus as the hapless target of teasing from a bunch of cranky grapes! Junior learns that forgiveness is the best ... See full summary »
cast: Dan Anderson|G. Bock|Heidi Landis|Bridget Miller|Jeff Morrow|Mike Nawrocki|Lisa Vischer|Phil Vischer
title: VeggieTales: God Wants Me to Forgive Them!?!
